A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is not only full of plot holes but it creates plot holes for previous Star Wars films. TLJ is full of cheap laughs that destroy every scene intended to have tension. TLJ not only doesn't answer or continue any theme or plot of Ep7 it succeeds in mocking the viewer for even considering this \"trilogy\" would have a plot line that flows together. I am a huge Star Wars fan and this did not feel like a Star Wars movie.
